sub_title: Senior Credit Analyst / Underwriter at Credit Europe Bank N.V.
summary:
I am a Senior Credit Analyst with 9 years experience at the Credits Department in various international banks. 

Currently, I have been working as Senior Credit Analyst for Credit Europe Bank NV since August 2021. In this role, I am responsible for oil and petrochemicals portfolio under structured trade and commodity finance department.

Before joining Credit Europe Bank NV, I was working as Senior Credit Analyst for Anadolubank Nederland N.V. in between Feb’19 to Aug’21. I was responsible for corporate, commercial, trade finance and FI clients. In this role, I analyze credit data and financial statements to determine the degree of risk involved in extending credit or lending money. Also, I prepare reports that include the degree of risk and generate financial ratios, using computer programs, to evaluate customers' financial status. Our most exciting work is to compare liquidity, profitability, and credit histories of establishments being evaluated with those of similar establishments in the same industries and geographic locations. Another interesting point is to analyze financial data such as income growth, quality of management, and market share to determine expected profitability of loans.   

Before Anadolubank Nederland NV, I worked as “Corporate and FI Credit Allocations Senior Associate” in between Jun’18 and Feb’19 for Alternatif Bank which is a subsidiary of the Commercial Bank of Qatar (CBQ), “Corporate and Commercial Credit Allocations Associate" in between Jun'17 and Jun'18 for Burgan Bank Turkey which is a subsidiary of KIPCO (Kuwait Projects Company) and “Corporate, Commercial and FI Credit Allocations Specialist" in between Jul'14 and May'17 for Odeabank A.Ş. which is owned by 82% - Bank Audi Sal and 18% - EBRD & IFC in Turkey. 

I’m truly passionate about my work and always eager to connect with other bank employers. While I enjoy all aspects of my job, I think my favorite stage of my job is analyzing the client's business process and financials.

In February 2021, I have completed thesis based Master of Business Administration (MBA) program in Bahçeşehir University. My thesis subject is “An Overview of Company Valuation, Its Techniques and an Implementation”. Also, I have a BS from Boğaziçi University which is the only Turkish university among the top 200 universities in the Best Global Universities Rankings for 2021.

profile_positions.description:
- Responsible for Oil and Petrochemical Portfolio under Structured Trade and Commodity Finance Department (clients with a turnover above USD 1 bln with complexity and international focus).
- Preparing high quality credit reports and pro-actively monitoring and reporting on the clients,
- Review and control over the limits, sub limits, tenors, collaterals, transaction patterns and documentary waivers on the proposed CAFs, Case Approvals before submitting to the Credit committees.
- Preparing the financial analysis, identify risks and define risk mitigations in the review Credit Packages  including assessment of main financial ratios (DSCR, ICR, etc.)
- Taking part in credit decision process by preparing the challenge sheet and the underwriting opinion in the credit packages,
- Challenge the credit risk rating or trader risk assessment, country risk assignment and submits to 2nd line of defense for approval,
- Monitoring daily, the risks, client positions and major discrepancies,
- Responsible for accurately and timely follow-up of credit policy and procedures and comply with the regulatory requirements defined by 2nd line of defense,
- Responsible for follow-up of the market sector developments and prepare quarterly sector reports.
profile_positions.title: Senior Credit Analyst / Underwriter

profile_positions.description:
- Responsible for corporate, commercial, trade finance and FI portfolio,
- Preparing the financial analysis and credit opinion for the proposal to be submitted to the Credit Committee,
- Attending the Credit Committee and to further explain the Credit Comments made,
- Coordinating the process of proposals that need a decision at parent level,
- Keep well informed of developments, trends and regulations in commodity markets with special focus on the commodity segment (Energy, Metals or Agriculture)
- Subsequent to market developments occurred, assess impact on specific client or portfolio and report to the Management Board.
- Preparing credit monitoring and risk reports of the overall corporate loan portfolio to be distributed to the Risk Management, Compliance, Internal Audit depts., external auditers and other regulatory authorities i.e. De Nederlandsche Bank,
- Ensuring that the transactions are properly booked in the Bank’s core system and that related MIS reports are prepared appropriately,
- Involving in generating reports that are required to monitor risks of the Corporate, Commercial, Trade Finance and Financial Institutions Portfolio.
